|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141752D20002J REV: 01B" and a date code of '''1032''' (Aug. 2010) :is silkscreened on the board of one production model 803 A. It would appear to be using the '''SuperTask!''' RTOS. Per the [http://dsl.vodafone.de/hilfe/files/vfksc/pdf/DSL-EasyBox803_Installationsanleitung_201006.pdf quick install guide], the default SSID is '''EasyBox XXXXXX'''. However, on an actual unit, the SSID pattern is '''EasyBox-XXXXXX''' :(not the last three octets of the BSSID, upper case letters). ===Used PSU(s)=== The power supply included with the device seems to have been a '''UMEC''' UP0251B-15PE. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = UMEC |model = UP0251B-15PE |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.6 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=CEE 7/4 |output_v=15 |output_a=1.66 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=small, horiz. |countrymanuf = China }} ==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/astoria/arv752dpw22 ARV752DPW22 on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *{{Wikidevi|Vodafone_DSL-EasyBox_803}} ===Forums=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=150188 803A on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.arcor-user-forum.de/easybox-803a-arv752dpw22-annex-a-firmware-4583/ ''Easybox 803A (arv752dpw22) Annex A firmware'' on ''ArcorUser'' forums] *[http://www.arcor-user-forum.de/neu-easybox-803-a-3192/ ''Neu : EasyBox 803'' on '''ArcorUserForum'''] :(some internal image pictures available to logged in users) ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRT |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=705661 |forumpage2 = https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=284887&sid=a89f273e668228abec8685b1bd57a020 |forumpage3 = https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=968779&sid=f6f75f40bd4b228038f16540404ff143 |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} *[https://dd-wrt.com/support/other-downloads/?path=betas%2F2024%2F02-09-2024-r55109%2Fvodafone_easybox_803%2F ''803A'' on '''DD-WRT''' Downloads] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/arcadyanastoria/arcadyanastoria_arv752dpw22_easybox803a |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/astoria/arv752dpw22 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=44389 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = lantiq |subtarget = xway |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 10.03.1 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The pinout is noted on the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki entry and is echoed below.. 
(3.3) (TxD) (RxD) (GND)
1     2     3     4
                  JP1
{{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
